SEARCH
Package com.pds.curiousmind.controller

Enum Class Controller

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Controller>
com.pds.curiousmind.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Controller>, Constable
public enum Controller extends Enum<Controller>
Singleton main controller that orchestrates user, course, and game operations.

This controller acts as a facade, delegating all business logic to the corresponding domain-specific controllers: UserController, CourseController, and GameController. It provides a unified API for managing users, courses, and game sessions in the application.

Usage example:

     Controller.INSTANCE.logIn("user", "pass");
     List<Course> courses = Controller.INSTANCE.getAllCourses();
Since:
1.0
